entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:59 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 05:56 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.1°C
Pressure: 99.4 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -19.4°C
Wind: NW 39 km/h gust 67 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow and blowing snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
